trans-unit.source: Represents a single tab page in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示在單一索引標籤頁<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: TabPage controls represent the tabbed pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: TabPage 控制項代表索引標籤式的頁面<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The order of tab pages in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection reflects the order of tabs in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的索引標籤頁的順序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合會反映在索引標籤的順序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更控制項中的索引標籤的順序，您必須移除並插入它們在新的索引，藉以變更集合中的位置。

trans-unit.source: TabPage controls are constrained by their container, so some of the properties inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class will have no effect, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>.
trans-unit.target: TabPage 控制項都會受到其容器，因此部分屬性繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>基底類別不會影響，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: The tabs in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> are part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> but not parts of the individual TabPage controls.
trans-unit.target: 中的索引標籤<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>屬於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>但不是個別 TabPage 控制項的一部份。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: Members of the TabPage class, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs.
trans-unit.target: TabPage 的成員類別，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>屬性，會影響只有用戶端矩形的索引標籤頁，但不是索引標籤。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method of the TabPage will not hide the tab.
trans-unit.target: 此外， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>TabPage 方法不會隱藏 [] 索引標籤</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide the tab, you must remove the TabPage control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏 索引標籤，您必須移除 TabPage 控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the TabPage occur.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，[] 索引標籤被視為屬於] 索引標籤頁面，以判斷何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>發生事件的 TabPage。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the TabPage do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>TabPage 的事件不會發生當焦點進入或離開工作索引標籤，但唯有在焦點進入或離開索引標籤頁的用戶端矩形。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how this control responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods, see the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> members: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關此控制項如何回應<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>方法，請參閱下列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>成員: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Controls contained in a TabPage are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 會顯示索引標籤頁面，並在這些控制項中的任何資料繫結不會啟動，直到索引標籤頁面會顯示在之前，不會建立 TabPage 所包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property lets you indicate whether the background of the tab page should render using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>屬性可讓您指出背景索引標籤頁面是否應該轉譯使用目前的視覺化樣式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>.
trans-unit.target: 發生這種情況只當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值都`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>屬性的父代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the background is painted normally.
trans-unit.target: 否則，繪製背景正常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> class and specifies the text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>類別，並指定 [] 索引標籤的文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> property is set to the value of the `text` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>屬性設定的值為`text`參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: 索引標籤的文字。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以變更的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>屬性和處理這個事件來判斷的值變更時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>屬性不是此控制項有意義。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: The control grows as much as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of its size property
trans-unit.target: 控制項成長依需要盡可能以適合其內容，但不會縮小小於其大小屬性的值

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定背景色彩<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the BackColor property is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, in which case the default value of the BackColor property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: BackColor 屬性的預設值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值都`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>，這個案例的背景色彩屬性的預設值是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>為</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>父代</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the BackColor value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項置於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>根據預設，繼承背景色彩值，因此這個行為會導致子系的背景與目前的視覺化樣式呈現控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the BackColor property automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 變更背景色彩屬性的值會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a BackColor value that you specify, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property after you set the BackColor property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>背景來呈現使用視覺化樣式，但您想要繼承背景色彩值，指定，這個值的子控制項設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>屬性設定 BackColor 屬性之後。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>表示的背景色彩<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制項的控制項集合的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>指派給控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the DockChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A>屬性不是有意義，此控制項，雖然您可以變更其值，並處理 DockChanged 事件，以便偵測到變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the EnabledChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A>屬性不是有意義，此控制項，雖然您可以變更其值，並處理 EnabledChanged 事件，以便偵測到變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the tab page that contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取包含指定的物件的索引標籤頁。

trans-unit.source: The object to look for.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> that contains the specified object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> ，其中包含指定的物件，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index to the image displayed on this tab.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此索引標籤上顯示的影像索引。

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex points to an image in the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: ImageIndex 指向相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A>中的映像

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index to the image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that appears on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引中的影像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>出現的索引標籤上。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which signifies no image.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1，表示沒有影像。

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex value is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: ImageIndex 值為小於-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key accessor for the image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*> of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中的映像的索引鍵存取子<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*>相關聯的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey property specifies the image from the image list to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey 屬性會指定從影像清單控制項上所顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key of the image.
trans-unit.target: 表示影像按鍵的字串。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: The x and y coordinates which specifies the location of the object.
trans-unit.target: X 和 y 座標指定物件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location*>

trans-unit.source: Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以變更的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>屬性和處理這個事件來判斷的值變更時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>屬性不是此控制項有意義。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: The upper limit of the size of the objet.
trans-unit.target: 物件大小的上限。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: The lower limit of the size of the objet.
trans-unit.target: 較低限制大小的下限。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，[] 索引標籤被視為屬於] 索引標籤頁面，以判斷何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>發生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>不會發生當焦點進入或離開工作索引標籤，但唯有在焦點進入或離開索引標籤頁的用戶端矩形。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnEnter method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnEnter 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，[] 索引標籤被視為屬於] 索引標籤頁面，以判斷何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>發生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>不會發生當焦點進入或離開工作索引標籤，但唯有在焦點進入或離開索引標籤頁的用戶端矩形。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnLeave method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnLeave 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 繪製背景的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The system calls this method to paint the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: 系統會呼叫這個方法，以繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>背景

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, this method paints the background using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值都`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>屬性之父代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>，這個方法會繪製在背景使用目前的視覺化樣式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method paints the background as usual.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法會如往常般繪製背景。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data useful for painting the background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> ，其中包含用於背景繪製資料。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: The size of a rectangular area into which the control can fit.
trans-unit.target: 能夠容納控制項之矩形區域的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates the order in which controls receive focus as a user presses the TAB key on a form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性會指出當使用者按下 TAB 鍵在表單上接收焦點的控制項的順序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls, however, and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>控制項內含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控制項，不過，並不會接收焦點分別做為表單的定位順序的一部分。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是因此這個類別沒有任何意義。

trans-unit.source: The tab order of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的定位順序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the TabIndexChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A>屬性不是有意義，此控制項，雖然您可以變更其值，並處理 TabIndexChanged 事件，以便偵測到變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>控制項內含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控制項並不會接收焦點分別做為表單的定位順序的一部分。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是因此這個類別沒有任何意義。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示索引標籤上的文字。

trans-unit.source: Changing the Text property value does not automatically center the new value on the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode>.
trans-unit.target: 變更文字屬性值不會自動置中 索引標籤上的新值如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode>屬性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: You can work around this limitation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or by removing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection and adding it back to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定解決這項限制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性或藉由移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合，並將它加入至集合的備份。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Both of these actions will automatically center the text.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種動作將會自動文字置中。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 要在索引標籤上顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此索引標籤的工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: This tab page belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: 此索引標籤頁面屬於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text appears when the user moves the mouse over the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 使用者的滑鼠經過索引標籤如果時顯示工具提示文字的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ToolTips, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需工具提示的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: 此索引標籤的工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之值的字串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*> property.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> background renders using the current visual style when visual styles are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>背景啟用視覺化樣式時，使用目前的視覺化樣式呈現。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background uses the current visual style only when the UseVisualStyleBackColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>背景會使用目前的視覺化樣式時，才 UseVisualStyleBackColor 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值都`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: When the UseVisualStyleBackColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當 UseVisualStyleBackColor 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值都`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>屬性的父代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>預設值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項置於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>繼承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>根據預設，因此這個行為會導致子系的背景與目前的視覺化樣式呈現控制項的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property automatically sets the UseVisualStyleBackColor property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 值變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>屬性會自動將 UseVisualStyleBackColor 屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value that you specify, set the UseVisualStyleBackColor property after you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>背景來呈現使用視覺化樣式，但您想要繼承的子控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>您在設定之後，您所指定值，設定 UseVisualStyleBackColor 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to render the background using the current visual style; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要呈現在背景使用目前的視覺化樣式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏在索引標籤<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，您必須移除控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A>屬性不是有意義，此控制項，雖然您可以變更其值，並處理 VisibleChanged 事件，以便偵測到變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏在索引標籤<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，您必須移除控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
